definitions.definition: A telecommunication device (originally mechanical , and now electronic ) used for two-way talking with another person (now often shortened to phone ).
The receiver of such a device.
Chinese whispers ; a situation in which an initial message has been distorted and misunderstood by being passed from person to person.

main_definition: ( countable , telephony ) A telecommunication device (originally mechanical , and now electronic ) used for two-way talking with another person (now often shortened to phone ).
secondary_definitions: ( countable , historical ) The receiver of such a device.
( Canada , US , uncountable ) The game of Chinese whispers .
( Canada , US , uncountable , figuratively ) Chinese whispers ; a situation in which an initial message has been distorted and misunderstood by being passed from person to person.
